DOC.detailed_description: In many cancer type , breast cancer melanoma , sentinel node assessment become standard care surgical treatment . Sentinel node first lymph node cancer cell likely spread primary tumor . Removal sentinel node examination accurately predict whether cancer spread node along nodal chain . Fluorescence image ICG dye ( Indocyanine Green ) use detect lymph node patient gastric , colorectal breast cancer . To date , use technique endometrial cancer report .
DOC.criteria: Biopsy proven endometrial carcinoma Must plan undergo standard endometrial cancer stag surgery part routine clinical care Must 18 year age old Must able comply study procedure Significant liver disease , cirrhosis liver insufficiency abnormal liver function test , total bilirubin > 1.5 time normal , and/or SGOT > 2 time normal Uremia , serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl Previous history adverse reaction allergy ICG dye , iodine , shellfish , iodine dye Previous lymphadenectomy surgery could change uterine lymphatic drainage Pregnant Currently participate drug , biologic and/or device treatment study Any medical condition would normally prevent someone receive general anesthesia undergo standard surgical procedure
